title: Republicans for Border Taxes
sub_head: Eighteen GOP Senators vote against a waiver process for tariffs.
body:
With prices rising fast, you’d think Republicans would want to find ways to cut prices. But on Wednesday 18 Senate Republicans, including many purported free-traders, voted to keep higher tariffs on U.S. businesses.
The Senate this week formally sent its industrial policy bill that includes subsidies for chip makers and other unnecessary spending to a conference committee with the House. We’ll leave arguments against the legislation for another day.
